name: Ctrl+Me Ctrl+You
description:
you control me

i control you

I made a mistake and uploaded a build with only 1 level, here's the complete one

https://pole458.itch.io/ctrlmectrlu

I don't know if that would count for the GameJam.

*sigh*  :(

If you're getting confused with the keys :

  • left/right/down arrow: turn the character you're controlling on their left/right/back
  • up arrow : action. Each character have a different action: some move forward, some shoot arrow, some strikes with an axe.
  • ctrl: control-swapping beam or revert swap

Take control of enemies, but pay attention: they will control your body.

Try to understand enemy movement
